name: Tesla Boy - A Robots Journey to Becoming Human
blurb: Take an adventure of enlightened transformation. Battle the mysterious Robotic Cabal and save a world from mass robotic termination.

rewards.reward:
==============================
THANK YOU
==============================

You'll receive Kickstarter backer updates (digital) as your reward. Your support of Tesla Boy helps us get one step closer to releasing our adventure and symbolic story to the masses.

==============================
DIGITAL MOBILE COPY (IOS, ANDROID)
==============================

Digital copy of the game for IOS and Android and Promo Code to share with friends.

==============================
DIGITAL MOBILE COPY & ARTWORK
==============================

Digital copy of the game for IOS and Android. Access to Artwork, Wallpapers and Promo Code to share with friends.

==============================
DIGITAL COPY ALL PLATFORMS (PC, MAC, LINUX, IOS, ANDROID)
==============================

Digital copy for all Platforms (IOS, Android, PC, Mac, Linux) and Promo Code to share with friends.

==============================
DIGITAL COPY ALL PLATFORMS & ARTWORK
==============================

Digital copy for all Platforms (IOS, Android, PC, Mac, Linux), Access to Artwork, Wallpapers, and Promo Code to share with friends.

==============================
NEIGHBORHOOD ROBOT DEALER
==============================

Receive Digital Copy of game for all platforms, access to wallpaper and artwork, 5,000 coins to spend on anything in the game plus a promo code to share game with friends.

==============================
LOCAL ROBOT DEALER
==============================

Receive Digital Copy of game for all platforms, access to wallpaper and artwork, 11,000 coins to spend on anything in the game plus a promo code to share game with friends.

==============================
BIG CITY ROBOT DEALER
==============================

Receive Digital Copy of game for all platforms, access to wallpaper and artwork, 120,000 coins to spend on anything in the game plus a promo code to share game with friends.

==============================
CONGLOMERATE ROBOT DEALER
==============================

Recieve Digital Copy of game for all platforms, access to wallpaper and artwork, 350,000 coins to spend on anything in the game plus a promo code to share game with friends.

==============================
I'M A BAD GUY
==============================

Send a picture and I'll make you 3d modeled a bad guy in a 2.5d world. Give your character a name and become part of Tesla Boy lore. Also includes Digital Copy of Game on all platforms, Artwork and Wallpaper and promo code for friend.

==============================
I'M A BAD GUY WITH LOOT
==============================

Send a picture and I'll make you a 3d modeled bad guy in a 2.5d world. Give your character a name and become part of Tesla Boy lore. Also includes Digital Copy of Game on all platforms, Artwork and Wallpaper, plus 350,000 coins to buy any and all upgrades in the game. Also a Promo Code to share with friends.

==============================
I'M A HERO
==============================

Send a picture and I'll make you a 3d Modeled selectable hero's in the Tesla Boy 2.5d world. Give your character a name and become part of Tesla Boy lore. Also includes Digital Copy of Game on all platforms, Artwork and Wallpaper, and Promo Code to share game with friends.

==============================
I'M A HERO WITH LOOT
==============================

Send a picture and I'll make you a 3d Modeled selectable hero's in the Tesla Boy 2.5d world. Give your character a name and become part of Tesla Boy lore. Also includes Digital Copy of Game on all platforms, Artwork and Wallpaper, Promo Code to share with friends, plus 350,000 coins to buy any and all upgrades in the game.
